Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    Account
    The `Account` class is a Java class that represents a user account and contains methods to set and retrieve the account's username, email, and password.
    AccountsManager
    The AccountsManager class manages user accounts, including sign up, login, verification, and OTP generation and verification.
    Address
    The `Address` class defines a set of instance variables and methods to represent and manipulate an address.
    Category
    The `Category` class stores a list of items and their names, and provides methods to add items to the list, display available items, and retrieve the category name.
    COD
    The COD class is a subclass of PaymentMethod that stores a phone number and allows for payment through cash on delivery.
    GeneralUser
    The GeneralUser class represents a user who can add items to their shopping cart, view their cart, and manage the contents of their cart.
    Item
    The `Item` class represents an item in a store, with various attributes such as name, category, description, price, and availability.
    ItemStatus
     
    LoggedInUser
    The `LoggedInUser` class represents a user who is logged in and has access to their account and order information, and includes methods for checking out, getting the user's address and account information, and setting order details.
    Main
     
    Order
    The Order class represents an order with a number, total price, ordered time, list of items, address, and payment method, and includes methods for setting and getting these attributes, displaying order information, and processing payments.
    OrderedItem
    The `OrderedItem` class represents an item that has been ordered, with information such as the item itself, its current price, quantity, and whether it is sold by weight or not, as well as methods to calculate the total price and get/set the quantity.
    PaymentMethod
    The PaymentMethod class is an abstract class with two abstract methods, one for making payments and one for taking a phone.
    ShoppingManager
    The ShoppingManager class manages items, categories, and orders in a shopping system, allowing users to add items to their cart, display a catalog, and check out.
